    PR 405 Approval Checklist

    Source: PR_405_APPROVAL_CHECKLIST.md

    PR Details

    • PR Number: 405
    • Title: docs(pr-process): document temporary CI block and local-validation self-merge policy
    • Type: Documentation
    • Files Changed: 2 files (+13, -0 lines)

    Pre-Approval Verification

    ✅ Content Accuracy

    • CI status correctly documented (blocked per Issue #406)
    • Required scripts exist and are functional
    • Policy criteria are clear and auditable
    • Issue reference (#406) is correct
    • Temporary nature is clearly stated

    ✅ Implementation Verification

    • Rscript scripts/pre-pr-validation.R exists and runs successfully
    • ./scripts/save-context.sh exists and is functional
    • Documentation changes are minimal and focused
    • Both files have consistent policy sections

    ✅ CRAN Compliance

    • No code changes that affect CRAN submission
    • Documentation-only change
    • No functional changes to package
    • Process improvement, not regression

    ✅ Security and Privacy

    • No security concerns (documentation only)
    • No privacy implications
    • Process documentation improves safety
    • Audit trail requirements included

    ✅ Code Quality

    • Documentation is clear and consistent
    • Content is well-structured
    • Formatting matches existing style
    • References are accurate

    Approval Criteria

    ✅ Content Accuracy

    • All information is current and correct
    • CI status accurately reflects current state
    • Required scripts are verified to exist and work
    • Policy criteria are clear and implementable

    ✅ Implementation Verification

    • Local validation script runs successfully
    • Save context script exists and is functional
    • Documentation changes are minimal and focused
    • No breaking changes introduced

    ✅ Risk Assessment

    • Low risk (documentation only)
    • Temporary policy (will be removed)
    • Clear benefits outweigh minimal risks
    • Process improvement, not regression

    ✅ Documentation Quality

    • Content is clear and understandable
    • Policy is well-structured
    • Consistent across both files
    • Appropriate for temporary nature

    Final Approval Decision

    ✅ APPROVED FOR MERGE

    Rationale: 1. Content is Accurate: All information verified as current and correct 2. Implementation Verified: Required scripts exist and function properly 3. Low Risk: Documentation-only change with clear benefits 4. Temporary Nature: Will be removed when CI is restored 5. Process Improvement: Provides clear guidance during CI downtime

    No blocking issues identified.

    Merge Instructions

    Standard Merge Process

    # Merge PR 405
gh pr merge 405 --merge --admin

    Post-Merge Validation

    • Verify merge completed successfully
    • Confirm documentation is updated
    • Check that policy is now in effect
    • Update any related documentation if needed

    Success Criteria

    ✅ All Criteria Met

    • Content accuracy verified
    • Implementation verified
    • No CRAN compliance issues
    • No security concerns
    • Low risk assessment
    • Clear benefits identified

    PR 405 is ready for immediate merge.
